segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it’s about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe he’s taking such a risk just for a snack.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, watching him like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on that plate, she doesn’t see any of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should warn her, but she seems completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and she’s standing right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s going to regret not noticing sooner.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is turning into a mess, and no one cares.
segments.speaker: PAR
